title: Fix missing favicon assets so the browser tab icon displays

requirements.text: Add the missing favicon image files to `frontend/public/assets/generated/` using the exact filenames referenced by `frontend/index.html` so the browser can successfully load them at runtime.

quotes: The favicon is still not showing up. Why is that? What can you do to fix it?
Go ahead and start and see if you can get it this time.

acceptanceCriteria: The following files exist in `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and are readable in the built app at the corresponding URLs: `/assets/generated/favicon-16.dim_16x16.png`, `/assets/generated/favicon-32.dim_32x32.png`, `/assets/generated/apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png`, `/assets/generated/android-chrome-192.dim_192x192.png`, `/assets/generated/android-chrome-512.dim_512x512.png`.
Each generated PNG is a crisp, centered, very simple pink heart on a transparent background at its target size (no white circular background).

requirements.text: Verify that `frontend/index.html` favicon `<link>` tags match the generated asset filenames and paths under `/assets/generated/`, and update `frontend/index.html` only if needed to keep the HTML references aligned with the actual files.

quotes: The favicon is still not showing up. Why is that? What can you do to fix it?
Go ahead and start and see if you can get it this time.

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/index.html` contains favicon `<link>` tags whose `href` paths resolve to existing files in `frontend/public/assets/generated/` after build.
After deployment, the favicon appears in the browser tab (after a normal refresh; if browser cache persists, it appears after a hard refresh).

constraints: Do not edit any files under the frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, and anything under `frontend/src/components/ui`).
Backend changes are not required for this fix; keep the backend single-actor architecture unchanged.
nonGoals: Do not add new product features unrelated to favicon display.
Do not introduce third-party services or external build pipelines for favicon generation.

required: Very simple pink heart on a transparent background (favicon-16.dim_16x16.png, 16x16)
Very simple pink heart on a transparent background (favicon-32.dim_32x32.png, 32x32)
Very simple pink heart on a transparent background (apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png, 180x180)
Very simple pink heart on a transparent background (android-chrome-192.dim_192x192.png, 192x192)
Very simple pink heart on a transparent background (android-chrome-512.dim_512x512.png, 512x512)
